Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute near Belmont/Lawndale
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses temp. rerouted EB Belmont, Milwaukee, Addison, Kedzie and Belmont: WB Belmont, Central Park, Diversey, Milwaukee and Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Belmont/Lawndale.

Eastbound buses will operate via Belmont, Milwaukee, Addison, Kedzie and Belmont

Westbound buses will operate via Belmont, Central Park, Diversey, Milwaukee and Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.
